prompt_inputs.goal: Marathon training with carbohydrate loading and high calorie intake for sustained energy and recovery

solution_criteria: Meal plan contains 4-5 meals/snacks distributed throughout the day
Total daily calories align with high-endurance athlete needs (approximately 3000-3500 calories)
Carbohydrates comprise 60-70% of total calories for glycogen loading
Includes protein-rich foods for muscle recovery (1.2-1.6g per kg body weight)
Incorporates easily digestible meals around training sessions
task_description: Write a compact, concise 1 day meal plan for a single athlete
scenario: Testing with a high-endurance athlete (marathon runner) requiring high calorie intake and carbohydrate loading, ensuring the meal plan emphasizes sustained energy and recovery nutrition

solution_criteria: Meal plan contains exactly 4-5 meals distributed throughout the day
Protein is prioritized and distributed across all meals (minimum 30g per meal)
Total daily macronutrients support muscle building (approximately 1.8-2.2g protein per kg bodyweight)
Plan is compact and concise (under 400 words)
task_description: Write a compact, concise 1 day meal plan for a single athlete
scenario: Testing with a strength-sport athlete (weightlifter) with specific macronutrient ratios needed for muscle building, validating that the plan prioritizes protein distribution across meals

prompt_inputs.goal: endurance cycling performance with sustained energy for 3+ hour rides

solution_criteria: Meal plan covers all three meals plus snacks for one day
All foods are vegan and nut-free
Includes adequate plant-based protein sources (legumes, tofu, seeds, grains) to support endurance athlete needs
Provides sufficient carbohydrates and electrolytes appropriate for cycling performance
